title: Hey, DT! What About YouTube's War With Ad-Blockers?
description:
0:00 Intro
0:20 What's your stance on YouTube going to war with ad-blockers?
4:27 Do you prefer flatpaks over other packages?
5:39 What is your recommendation for Remote Desktop on Arco?
8:22 How warm does it get in your office with the lights etc.? Or is there AC?
10:03 How are you so tan being a computer geek? ;) You must have an outside job.
12:00 My wife also really likes your voice.
12:34 Is there a GUI radio player that you'd recommend?
13:41 My dream is to become a bare git repository
13:58 What do you think about the future of privacy ~10 years ahead?
18:06 Thanks to the Patrons!
